sentence.text: We established a genetic diagnosis in six families with autosomal recessive HSP (chemical synaptic transmission in three families and ER to Golgi vesicle-mediated transport/ER to Golgi vesicle-mediated transport, negative regulation of inclusion body assembly and positive regulation of GTPase activity in one family each).

entity.text: negative regulation of inclusion body assembly

sentence.text: Patients did not present with visual impairment as observed in a previously reported ER to Golgi vesicle-mediated transport family (c.316CAAAAT (p.(Arg106Cys)) in coiled-coil domain), suggesting unique contributions of the PB1 and coiled-coil domains in ER to Golgi vesicle-mediated transport complex formation/function and a possible phenocardiac muscle tissue development correlation to variant location.
